`融入`

A.transitive verb

① (incorporate) 使成为一体 shǐ chéngwéi yītǐ

▸ to integrate sth into or with sth;

使某物与某物成为一体

▸ to be well integrated with its surroundings

与环境融为一体

② (blend, combine) 使融入 shǐ róngrù

▸ to integrate sb into or with sth;

使某人融入某群体

▸ to integrate two systems

合并两个系统

③ Mathematics 求…的积分 qiú… de jīfēn ‹number, quantity, expression›

成为一体 chéngwéi yītǐ
